law.catch_line: In Washington County, a county license or permit may not be issued or renewed until the Washington C...
law.text: In Washington County, a county license or permit may not be issued or renewed until the Washington County Treasurer and any municipal corporation in Washington County in which the applicant does business certify that there are no delinquent personal property taxes due from the applicant to the county or municipal corporation. The Washington County Commissioners, by majority vote, may waive this requirement.
